entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Run code clean up with "Fix all warnings and errors set in EditorConfig" ignores sort_system_directives_first = false #72376
  • Refactor suggestion: Remove unnecessary (value As String) in VB.NET property setters #72373
  • IntelliSense suggests the `readonly` modifier even when it's already present in the incomplete declaration #72372
    Backlog

Closed

  • Improper IDE0004 Cast is Redundant Suggestion for Delegates Conversion #62072
    Backlog
  • Cannot get the size of a value tuple in the expression evaluator in the debugger #62776
    17.6 P3

PullRequests

Created

  • WIP: Attempt at reducing the file I/O under the AnalyzerAssemblyLoader folder. #72377
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • WIP: Reduce allocations required to create a TransformNode #72375
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Updated

  • Reduce closure and Lazy allocations inside CSharpCompilation.ctor #72371
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
